### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(-40.5, 40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (-40.5, 40.5)) 

### Offshore pump at position(-18.5, 27.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (-18.5, 27.5)) and connected pipes

### Offshore pump at position(-16.5, 26.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (-16.5, 26.5)) and connected pipes

### Boiler at position(1.5, 1.0)
Consists of boiler(position (1.5, 1.0)) and connected pipes

### Boiler at position(1.5, 3.0)
Consists of boiler(position (1.5, 3.0)) and connected pipes

### Boiler at position(-24.5, 32.0)
Consists of boiler(position (-24.5, 32.0)) and connected pipes

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities on water
- Ensure the entity is not being placed on water before attempting placement
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure the entities are not nil before attempting connection
- Ensure the pipe can be placed at the desired location before attempting connection
### Errors when placing offshore pumps
- Ensure there is an offshore pump in the inventory before attempting placement
### Errors when placing pipes near entities
- Ensure the pipe does not overlap with the entity footprint before attempting placement
### Errors when using connect_entities function
- Ensure the entities are valid and not nil before attempting connection
- Ensure the pipe prototype is valid before attempting connection
